description: Click here to manage the quizzes.
Click here to create a quiz.
Click here to create a simple quiz.
Enter the quiz title here. you can search/add the quiz with the same title.
Select the quiz type from here.
Enter a description about the quiz.
Enter/Edit quiz duration from here. Click the edit icon, enter time and select the time unit. it will show the updated time as soon as you click on the CROSS button.
Enable to auto evaluate the quiz.
Set number of questions per page user will see.
Set the number of times a user can retakes the quiz. Set 9999 to set this infinite.
Add a message that will be visible to the user after submitting the quiz.
Enable to show the result to the students when they completed the quiz
Enable so students can check the marked answer.
Enable to show random questions within the quiz to students
Make the quiz accessible for non-logged-in users.
Show submit quiz button in quiz when the user reaches the last question.
Search already created questions here to add them to the quiz.
Type Question title here to search(type minimum 4 characters to search).
Click here to add the search question to the quiz.
Set the marks for the question.
Click here to back on create/search question section.
Click here to create a question.
Click the question type to create a question.
Select/Add Question tag
Enter the question statement.
Enter the question's answer here(enter 1 if it is true or 0 if false).
Enter the answer hint for the students
Enter the answer explanation here. it will be visible to students once they answered the question.
Click to create the question
Enter marks for the created question.
Click here to create the quiz.

tour.post_content: Learn how you can create a course with all settings a

title: Create A Course
Course categories
Course Title
Short Description
Description with Text
Description with Image
Column Division
Shortcode Embedder
Course duration
Max Seat
Start date
Automatic Evalaution
Move to Settings
Select Pre-required Course
Unit and Quiz lock
Enable Offline Course
Full Unit in Curriculum
Hide Course Button
Show Course Progress
Show Time Based Course Progress
Post Course Reviews
Enable Drip Feed
Drip Feed
Drip Feed Origin(Starting Point)
Drip Type
Gap Duration
Drip Duration
Enable Course Certificate
Enable Course Badge
Course Retakes
Course Instructions
Course Completion Message
Next Step
Add Components
Next Step
Build Curriculum
Upload Package
Scorm Package
Tincan Package
Html Package
Select Existing Package
Upload Above Package
Click Here
Add Section
Add Section Name
Add Unit
description: Check how you can create a course.
Select/Create new course categories.
Enter course title will be displayed as course name.
Enter course short description, which will be available just below the course title.
Enter text detailed description for the course, which will be available in the course content area.
Enter image in the description for the course.
select column division for course description.
Embed videos/ppt/files, use direct Html block, add note, insert tab, and many more here.
Enter course duration here. maximum duration in which students can finish the course. set 9999 for unlimited access.
Enter the maximum number of seats. set 9999 to infinite and blank to disable.
Set the course start date here. before this student can't take the course.
Enable this to evaluate the course automatically after course submission.
Click here to move on to the settings section
A pre-required course which the user needs to complete before subscribing to this course
Force previous unit access lock
Enable offline course to check more
Full Unit content is available for users subscribed to the course, directly from the Course curriculum. Recommended for Offline Courses.
Hide the Course button after the user is subscribed to the Course.
Display Course progress on Course home page.
Automatically calculate progress based on Time elapsed in Course / Total course duration.
Enable course subscribed students to post reviews from Course home.
Enable Drip Feed to check more.
Drip Feed courses, units are released one by one after a certain duration of time.
Drip Feed origin, count time from Previous Unit Access Time (default) OR Course starting date/time (if start date not set).
Drip Feed type, release units, or sections.
The time gap between adjacent Units/Sections release
Enter the drip duration for the course in %s. This is the duration after which the next unit/section unlocks for the user after viewing the previous unit/section.
Enable the course certificate, select the course certificate template, and set marks to obtain the certificate.
Enable Course Badge, upload badge image, set badge title and set marks to obtain the badge.
Set number of times a student can re-take the course (0 to disable)
Course instructions are displayed when the user starts a course.
A completion message is shown to the student when she finishes the course.
Click here to move on Components.
As soon as you enable BuddyPress components (Groups/Forums/Batches), will be available here, you can create new or select existing ones from here.
Click here to create the Course Curriculum.
Learn how you can create a curriculum for a course.
You can directly upload the course package here.
Upload Scorm Package here.
Upload Tincan Package here.
Upload HTML Package here.
Can select an existing package from here.
Upload the above-uploaded package.
Click here to change the Curriculum type. Learn how you can switch course curriculum type
From here you can add a section for the course curriculum
Enter section name here.
Click to add units in the course curriculum.
